articles.description: Comic-Con returns to San Diego this fall for an in-person event over Thanksgiving weekend, sparking criticism from fans and professional attendees.
articles.content: Of all the events canceled because of the coronavirus, few are as lively and vibrant as Comic-Con. As the conference moves online, here's a look back at some of the best fan costumes over the years. … [+4367 chars]
